pages.title: Fire Salamander
pages.text: Salamandra is a genus of six species of salamanders localized in central and southern Europe, Northern Africa, and western Asia.

pages.title: Fire Salamander
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 3 Days
